QuestData.Title: Slowing the Inevitable
QuestData.Description: As much as I want to exact swift and brutal revenge... I must honor my son's memory first. He cared for his people first and foremost.$B$BThe Undertaker's Pass goes underground below Northgate River. You must prevent the plague from being deployed while we evacuate our men, women and children to Aderic's Repose.$B$BWe captured one of the Forsaken's dreaded bombing bats. I want you to fly the infernal beast as best you can and unleash hell upon those who seek to bring the Plague to our people. Hurry!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Captured Riding Bat to destroy 6 Forsaken Catapults and 40 Invading Forsaken.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $n. Almost everybody managed to make it through.
